A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie was terrible at best\, dog turd at worst.  

So in the past 2 movies we lost Han\, Luke\, Leia (IRL) and Snoke.  All we're left with for the next episode are the underdeveloped Finn\, Po\, Rey and Kylo - not to mention the annyoing newcomer\, Rose.

How are we supposed to care what happens in the next episode?  Anyone we loved or had any intrigue to them are gone and we're left with some pretty weak characters.  

Maybe they can bring Lando back.  Nah\, they'll just kill him in a very lame way too.
